vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.8;
son of: Ashhur (H0806) and Helah (H2458);
brother of: Haahashtari (H0326), Zereth (H6889), Izhar (H3328) and Ethnan (H0869);
half-brother of: Ahuzzam (H0275), Hepher (H2660) and Temeni (H8488);
father of: Anub (H6036), Zobebah (H6637), Harum (H2037) and Jabez (H3258H)(?)
§ Koz = "thorn"
1) a descendant of Judah
2) a priest who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hombre; tribu de Judá; (b)   sacerdote; en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哥斯 或 哈歌斯 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "荊棘"
1)猶大的後裔 #代上 4:8|
2)一個跟隨所羅巴伯歸回的祭司
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哥斯 或 哈歌斯 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "荆棘"
1)犹大的后裔 #代上 4:8|
2)一个跟随所罗巴伯归回的祭司

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.10
§ Koz = "thorn"
1) a descendant of Judah
2) a priest who returned from exile with Zerubbabel

1) a descendant of Judah
2) a priest who returned from exile with Zerubbabel

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.3.4;

§ Koz = "thorn"
1) a descendant of Judah
2) a priest who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
